ygData.msgSnippet: Gnolls in SK ... From:  To:  Sent: Tuesday, October 23, 2001 9:39 AM Subject: [EverQuest] Picking up a little
ygData.messageBody:
Gnolls in SK

----- Original Message -----
From: <MLockridge01@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 23, 2001 9:39 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Picking up a little eq cash


> I am a halfling druid, lvl 26. I currently hunt craig spiders in east
> karanas to get the nice silk drops. I use this to build my tailoring
> skills. Soon I will no longer get exp with these hunts, and I will
> have advanced my tailoring as much as possible with craig spiders
> silk. So, I am wondering where I can go to make some money.
>
> I know that I can go to Neriak and camp guards for their 2pp bronze
> weapons, but wonder if there is anything equally profitable which
> will also net me some exp and perhaps let me explore some place new.
>
> any suggestions?
>
> Barto Proudfoot
> Zeboxorouk
>
>
>
